data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Distrito Federal hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Distrito Federal, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Distrito Federal that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Distrito Federal, Mexico.
Father, guide the church in Distrito Federal, Mexico to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Huichol people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Huichol people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Huichol people is yours.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Distrito Federal, Mexico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Distrito Federal, Mexico.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 927,507 believers in the state of Distrito Federal.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
